I was having trouble to fin the option to enable mirroring.
just double click at the home button of iPad, iPhone or iPod touch and scroll left. Click the AirPlay icon. Select the device and turn on the mirroring bar.
The home screen should open as well as fotos, videos, browsing, email etc.
